creator: Peter.Zagorski@mummert.de
text:
The problem seems to appear in 2 different constellations: (1) In a test plan all requests are filled correctly with the session-id only in the last request ("logout") the value is missing while the name of the session variable (followed by '=') is placed in the request. Instead the parameters of the GET request are immediately appended to the request. A snippet from an *.jtl file (in "jsessionid=" the value is missing): GET http://135.10.1.2:9080/AIP/AipServlet;jsessionid=?logout=true

Error page exception

... (2) similar problems occur when using run once controllers for login and random controller to perform different tasks (here: searches) in the testplan. Here JMeter includes the name of the session variable but not the value (see "jsessionid") POST http://135.10.1.2:9080/AIP/SearchServlet;jsessionid= Query data: name=hurz&vorname=&mnr=0001&geburtsdatum=&geburtsname=&geschlecht=&strasse=&plz= &ort=

Sorry, not enough information to be able to debug this.

If the problem is still happening, please re-open.
creator: sebb@apache.org
